com.github.basking2.sdsai.sandbox.ai.nnet

Class ScaledHiddenNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.basking2.sdsai.UFSet
      • com.github.basking2.sdsai.sandbox.graph.GraphNode
        • com.github.basking2.sdsai.sandbox.ai.nnet.HiddenNode
          • com.github.basking2.sdsai.sandbox.ai.nnet.ScaledHiddenNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NeuralNetElement, GraphElement, Node

    public class ScaledHiddenNode
extends HiddenNode
    This class adds a scaling edge to the HiddenNode. Some times this increases accuracy and some times this just confuses the NeuralNet. It will invariably increase the wall clock time of training and evaluation, though it may make some hypothesies learnable where a Net without this scaling edge might not otherwise converge.
